00071   class BmlSlowRunDataBlock : public CALICE::DaqTypeDataBlock {

00075     
00077      BmlSlowRunDataBlock() {
00078       //Initialze the type map(s)
00079       setTypes();
00080       //do some initialization 
00081       setAbsorberPosition(0.);    
00082       setT4Position(0.);
00083       setTargetPosition(0.);
00084       setTimeStamp(NULL);
00085       //Reset the output vectors
00086       _sextapoleCurrents.resize(0);
00087       _bendCurrents.resize(0);
00088       _colPositions.resize(0);
00089       _quadrupoleCurrents.resize(0); 
00090       _trimCurrents.resize(0);
00091       _h6aExpCounts.resize(0);
00092       _h6bExpCounts.resize(0);
00093       _h6cExpCounts.resize(0);
00094       _rpExpCounts.resize(0);
00095       _scintCounts.resize(0);
00096       //Loop over the map with the defined types and initialize the
00097       //position in the LCIO tuple and number values to -1
00098       //initialize the dbl values
00099       for ( BmlSroTypesDblMap_t::iterator types_iter = _theDblTypes.begin(); types_iter != _theDblTypes.end(); types_iter++) setNumPos( (*types_iter).second.first, -1 , -1); 
00100       //initialize the int values
00101       for ( BmlSroTypesIntMap_t::iterator types_iter = _theIntTypes.begin(); types_iter != _theIntTypes.end(); types_iter++) setNumPos( (*types_iter).second.first, -1 , -1); 
00102       //initialize the float values
00103       for ( BmlSroTypesFloatMap_t::iterator types_iter = _theFloatTypes.begin(); types_iter != _theFloatTypes.end(); types_iter++) setNumPos( (*types_iter).second.first, -1 , -1); 
00104       
00105       
00106       
00107     };
00108     
00109     
00110     //Set Parameters of the board by which the data were taken  
00113     BmlSlowRunDataBlock(LCObject* obj) :  DaqTypeDataBlock(obj, false) { 
00114       //Reset the output vectors
00115       _sextapoleCurrents.resize(0);
00116       _bendCurrents.resize(0);
00117       _quadrupoleCurrents.resize(0); 
00118       _trimCurrents.resize(0);
00119       _h6aExpCounts.resize(0);
00120       _h6bExpCounts.resize(0);
00121       _h6cExpCounts.resize(0);
00122       _rpExpCounts.resize(0);
00123       _scintCounts.resize(0);
00124       //Initialize thw type map(s)
00125       setTypes();
00126       //... and prepare the output vectors
00127       prepareOutputVecs();
00128     }

00135       obj()->setDoubleVal(kDblBmlSroRunPosAbsPosition, abspos);
00136       return *this;
00137       }

00140     double getAbsorberPosition() const {
00141       return getDoubleVal(kDblBmlSroRunPosAbsPosition);
00142       };

00144     
00149     BmlSlowRunDataBlock& setTimeStamp(struct tm* timestamp) 
00150     {
00151       
00152       if(timestamp){
00153         //Timestamp year month day
00154         int timestampymd(0);
00155         timestampymd = timestampymd | ( ( (timestamp->tm_year + TM_YEARSTART) & 0xffff) << YEARSHIFT) 
00156           | ( ( (timestamp->tm_mon + 1) & 0xff) << MONTHSHIFT)
00157           | ( (  timestamp->tm_mday & 0xff) << DAYSHIFT);  
00158         
00159         
00160         //Timestamp hour minute second
00161         int timestamphms(0);
00162         timestamphms = timestamphms | ( (timestamp->tm_hour & 0xff) << HOURSHIFT)
00163           | ( (timestamp->tm_min  & 0xff) << MINUTESHIFT)
00164           | ( (timestamp->tm_sec  & 0xff) << SECONDSHIFT);  
00165         
00166         
00167         obj()->setIntVal(kIntBmlSroRunPosTimeStampymd, timestampymd);
00168         obj()->setIntVal(kIntBmlSroRunPosTimeStamphms, timestamphms);
00169       } else {
00170         obj()->setIntVal(kIntBmlSroRunPosTimeStampymd, 0);
00171         obj()->setIntVal(kIntBmlSroRunPosTimeStamphms, 0);
00172         
00173       }
00174       return *this;
00175     }
00176     
00177     
00180      LCTime getTimeStamp() const
00181     {      
00182       int timestampymd(getIntVal(kIntBmlSroRunPosTimeStampymd));
00183       int timestamphms(getIntVal(kIntBmlSroRunPosTimeStamphms));
00184       
00185       //composition of an intermediate LCTime object in order
00186       //to get everything up to seconds in nanosecs.
00187       LCTime init(  (timestampymd >> YEARSHIFT) & 0xffff,
00188                     (timestampymd >> MONTHSHIFT) & 0xff,     
00189                     (timestampymd >> DAYSHIFT) & 0xff,     
00190                     (timestamphms >> HOURSHIFT) & 0xff,     
00191                     (timestamphms >> MINUTESHIFT) & 0xff,     
00192                     (timestamphms >> SECONDSHIFT) & 0xff );
00193       LCTime finaltime(init.timeStamp());
00194       return finaltime;
00195       
00196     }
00197     
00200     LCTime getTimeStampBml() {return getTimeStamp();}
00201     
00204     LCTime getTimeStampDaq() {return 0;}

00303     const double getBeamEnergy() {
00304      return static_cast<double>(fabs(getBendCurrents().at(8))/4.72*1000);
00305     }

00322     const std::string getDataDescription() const {
00323       return
00324     "i:timestamp_year_month_day,i:timestamp_hour_minute_second,d:absorberposition,d:t4position,d:targetposition,i:posbendcurmeas,i:nbendcurmeas,i:poscollimposmeas,i:ncollimposmeas,i:posquadcurmeas,i:nquadcurmeas,i:possextcurmeas,i:nsextcurmeas.i:postrimcurmeas,i:ntrimcurmeas,i:posh6aexpcntmeas,i:nh6aexpcntmes,i:posh6bexpcntmeas,i:nh6bexpcntmeas,i:posh6cexpcntmeas,i:nh6cexpcntmeas,i:posrpexpcntmeas,i:nrpexpcntmeas,i:posscntcntmeas,i:nscntcntmeas,d[nbendcurmeas]:bendcurrents,d[ncollimposmeas]:collimatorpositions,d[nquadcurmeas]:quadrupolecurrents,d[nsextcurmeas]:sextapolecurrents,d[ntrimcurmeas]:trimcurrents,i[nh6aexpcntmes]:h6aexperimentcounts,i[nh6bexpcntmes]:h6bexperimentcounts,i[nh6cexpcntmes]:h6cexperimentcounts,i[nrpexpcntmes]:rpexperimentcounts,i[nscntcntmes]:scintillatorcounts" ;
00325     }

00330     void setNumPos(int posindex, int pos, int numvals){
00331       obj()->setIntVal(posindex, pos);
00332       obj()->setIntVal(posindex+1, numvals);
